QuestData.Title: Felendren the Banished
QuestData.Description: A betrayer of our people resides atop Falthrien Academy to the southwest.$B$BFelendren is his name, and he was banished from blood elf lands for failing to heed the warnings of our teachers and elders. He is the worst of our society, as he lives only to feed his insatiable magical addictions. He refused to learn control; he is a shell of his former self - one of the Wretched - and he is a threat to the Sunspire.$B$BDestroy him and the wraiths he uses as minions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Arcane Wraiths and 2 Tainted Arcane Wraiths, as well as Felendren the Banished; they are located in the Falthrien Academy. Bring Felendren's Head to Lanthan Perilon on Sunstrider Isle.
QuestData.CompletionText: Heed well this warning - Felendren the Banished is only a symptom of a much larger problem. His demise will solve our immediate concerns, but all blood elves share the potential same fate as him if we let our addictions get the best of us.
QuestData.RewardText: Felendren's head... you are to be commended, $n. You've succeeded where others, like Felendren, have utterly failed. Perhaps you are truly ready to be a contributing member of blood elf society.$B$BYour success here means that you are capable of surviving the greater threats that lurk in Eversong... and believe me, there are plenty to face.
